00022 /**
00023  * @file   SnpTable.h
00024  * @author Chuck Sugnet
00025  * @date   Thu Feb  9 16:29:28 2006
00026  * 
00027  * @brief Big table of genotype data. Rows are snp probesets, columns are
00028  * experiments. Entries are -1 = NN, 0 = AA, 1 = AB, 2 = BB 
00029  */
00030 
00031 #ifndef SNPTABLE_H
00032 #define SNPTABLE_H
00033 
00034 #include "file/TsvFile/TsvFile.h"
00035 //
00036 #include <cassert>
00037 //
00038 
00039 using namespace affx;
00040 class SnpTable {
00041 
00042 public:
00043 
00044   const static int NN = -1;
00045   const static int AA = 0;
00046   const static int AB = 1;
00047   const static int BB = 2;
00048 
00049   /** 
00050    * Read in genotypes from a file that looks like
00051    * probeset_id [tab] chip1 [tab] chip2 [tab]... chipN
00052    * SNP_A-1889420 [tab] -1 [tab] 0 [tab] 2 [tab] ... 1
00053    *
00054    * Entries are -1 = NN, 0 = AA, 1 = AB, 2 = BB 
00055    * @param fileName - name of file to open.
00056    */
00057   void open(const std::string& fileName);
00058 
00059   /** @brief     Return the number of rows in the file
00060    *  @return    rows
00061    */
00062   int getNumRows();
00063 
00064   /** @brief     Return the number of columns in the file.
00065    *  @return    columns
00066    */
00067   int getNumCols();
00068 
00069 
00070   /** @brief     Get the name of row rowIx
00071    *  @param     rowIx     
00072    *  @return    the name
00073    */
00074   const std::string &getRowName(int rowIx);
00075 
00076 
00077   /** @brief  Get the name of column colIx
00078    *  @param  colIx
00079    *  @return the name
00080    */
00081   const std::string &getColName(int colIx);
00082 
00083   /** 
00084    * Find the row index associated with a particular identified, -1 if
00085    * not found.
00086    * 
00087    * @param s - row identifier.
00088    * @return - index if found, -1 otherwise.
00089    */
00090   int getRowIndex(const std::string &s);
00091 
00092   /** 
00093    * Find the col index associated with a particular identified, -1 if
00094    * not found.
00095    * 
00096    * @param s - col identifier.
00097    * @return - index if found, -1 otherwise.
00098    */
00099   int getColIndex(const std::string &s);
00100 
00101   /** 
00102    * Get the genotype for the particular row and index of the genotype matrix.
00103    * 
00104    * @param rowIndex - Row of interest.
00105    * @param colIndex - Column of interest.
00106    * @return the genotype requested.
00107    */
00108   int getGenotypeForSnp(int rowIndex, int colIndex);
00109 
00110 private:
00111   /// Unique identifiers (usually probeset ids) associated with each row.
00112   std::vector<std::string> m_RowNames;        
00113   /// Unique identifiers (usually chip names) associated with each column.
00114   std::vector<std::string> m_ColNames;
00115   /// Map of probeset ids to the index of the row that contains the
00116   /// data for that snp
00117   std::map<std::string, int> m_RowNameMap;
00118   /// Map of probeset ids to the index of the column that contains the
00119   /// data for that chip
00120   std::map<std::string, int> m_ColNameMap;
00121   /// Matrix of genotypes rows are snps, columns are the chips.
00122   std::vector<std::vector<int> > m_GTypes;
00123 
00124 };
00125 
00126 #endif /* SNPTABLE_H */
